description: Attributes that define the identity, role, and nature of the character.

subcategories.description: Defines the gender identity of the character.
Describes the age group or stage of the character.
General identity or role of the character, such as hero, villain, or background figure.
Specifies non-human or mythical races, such as elf, orc, dragonkin, or demon.
Additional character-related traits not covered by other categories.

description: Details about the physical appearance of characters or objects.

subcategories.description: Defines the color of the character's hair.
Describes the hairstyle.
Describes the texture of the hair.
Describes the presence and style of bangs.
Additional hair features such as highlights or colored tips.
Defines the iris color.
Describes the shape of the pupil.
Defines the shading or gradient of the eyes.
Describes the state or action of the eyes.
Defines the overall shape of the face.
Indicates the presence and style of lip gloss or shine.
Describes the shape or type of ears.
Defines the facial expression.
Defines the skin tone or color.
Describes the size of the chest area.
Specifies the color of fingernails.
Describes the overall physique.
Defines the shape or proportion of legs.

description: Clothing and accessories worn by the character.

subcategories.description: General description of clothing worn by the character.
Specifies the fashion or theme of the clothing.
Describes the fabric or texture of the clothing.
Defines the color scheme or pattern of the clothing.
Additional wearable items such as jewelry, glasses, or crown.
Describes the presence and type of gloves.
Defines the type of shoes or boots worn.
Describes the type or style of socks.

description: Describes the character's pose, gestures, and camera perspective.

subcategories.description: Describes the character's posture or stance.
Defines the gesture or activity of the hands.
Specifies the camera angle or perspective.
